items.title: Scale AI Lays Off 200 Employees: 'We Ramped Up Our GenAI Capacity Too Quickly'
items.summary: Scale AI is laying off 200 employees and 500 contractors as part of a major restructuring, following Meta's purchase of a 49% stake. This comes just weeks after the CEO was absorbed into a new superintelligence lab.

items.summary: Red Bull Bragantino and São Paulo will face off in a Brasileirão-2025 match this Wednesday at 9:30 PM. The game will take place at Cícero de Souza Marque.

items.summary: 'Latam-GPT' adapts to local dialects with collaboration from over 30 Latin American institutions to create a version of ChatGPT trained on local languages and nuances.

items.title: China builds underwater data center
items.summary: China is building an underwater data center to reduce cooling costs and meet the increasing demand for computing power driven by artificial intelligence. Cooling facilities currently require large amounts of water, posing a challenge as water supplies are limited in many regions.

items.title: Hackbots biggest cloud security risk, slashing attack times to minutes

items.title: This car is just 19 inches wide, and it actually drives
items.summary: This car, known as the 'Flat Fiat,' is only 19 inches wide and is built entirely by hand from scrap materials. Despite its small size, it is able to drive, showcasing innovative design and engineering.

items.title: Unraveling Disorder-to-Order Transitions and Chemical Ordering in PtCoM Ternary Alloys Using Machine Learning Potential
items.summary: Researchers used machine learning potential to investigate disorder-to-order transitions and chemical ordering in PtCoM ternary alloys, providing insight into their properties. The study, published in Chem. Sci., demonstrates a novel approach to understanding alloy structures and behavior.

items.title: Adata surges on memory boom, eyes AI and Biotech for next growth wave
items.summary: Taiwanese memory module maker Adata Technology reported a surge in after-tax profit in June 2025, signaling a comeback from a loss the previous year. The company is now looking towards AI and Biotech for its next growth wave.

items.title: “Dear ChatGPT, please say my name.”
items.summary: Companies are focusing on getting ChatGPT to mention their name in their marketing plans as it sits on approximately 5 billion monthly visits, indicating the growing importance of AI in marketing strategies.
